deck.name: Body Slam
deck.description: Deal damage equal to your Block.

deck.name: Clash
deck.description: Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Attack. Deal 14 damage.

deck.name: Flourish
deck.description: Gain 5 Regen. Can only be played if your health is below 50%.

deck.name: Intimidate
deck.description: Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

deck.name: Soul Drain
deck.description: Apply 3 Weak and Vulnerability to ALL enemies. Drains 3 Health from you.

deck.name: Succube
deck.description: Deal 2 damage to ALL enemies and suck it into life.

deck.name: Summer of Sam
deck.description: Gain 1 Health. If your health is below 50% draw 2 cards.

deck.name: Thunderclap
deck.description: Deal 4 damage. Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

deck.name: Voodoo Gift
deck.description: Deal damage equal to target's Vulnerable and Weak and remove the debuffs.
